Protocols/ICTokenFieldDelegate.html#/c:@.name: tokenFieldDidBeginEditing(_:)
Protocols/ICTokenFieldDelegate.html#/c:@.abstract: Tells the delegate that editing began for the token field.

Protocols/ICTokenFieldDelegate.html#/c:@.name: tokenFieldDidEndEditing(_:)
Protocols/ICTokenFieldDelegate.html#/c:@.abstract: Tells the delegate that editing stopped for the token field.

Protocols/ICTokenFieldDelegate.html#/c:@.name: tokenFieldWillReturn(_:)
Protocols/ICTokenFieldDelegate.html#/c:@.abstract: Tells the delegate that the token field will process the pressing of the return button.

Protocols/ICTokenFieldDelegate.html#/c:@.name: tokenField(_:didChangeInputText:)
Protocols/ICTokenFieldDelegate.html#/c:@.abstract: Tells the delegate the input text is changed.

Protocols/ICTokenFieldDelegate.html#/c:@.name: tokenField(_:shouldCompleteText:)
Protocols/ICTokenFieldDelegate.html#/c:@.abstract: Asks the delegate if the text should become a token in the token field.

Protocols/ICTokenFieldDelegate.html#/c:@.name: tokenField(_:didCompleteText:)
Protocols/ICTokenFieldDelegate.html#/c:@.abstract: Tells the delegate that the text becomes a token in the token field.

Protocols/ICTokenFieldDelegate.html#/c:@.name: tokenField(_:didDeleteText:atIndex:)
Protocols/ICTokenFieldDelegate.html#/c:@.abstract: Tells the delegate that the token at certain index is removed from the token field.

Protocols/ICTokenFieldDelegate.html#/c:@.name: tokenField(_:subsequentDelimiterForCompletedText:)
Protocols/ICTokenFieldDelegate.html#/c:@.abstract: Asks the delegate for the subsequent delimiter string for a completed text in the token field.

Protocols/ICTokenFieldDelegate.html.name: ICTokenFieldDelegate
Protocols/ICTokenFieldDelegate.html.abstract: The protocol defines the messages sent to a delegate. All the methods are optional.

Classes/ICTokenField.html#/s:16ICInputAc.name: delimiters
Classes/ICTokenField.html#/s:16ICInputAc.abstract: Characters that completes a new token, defaults are whitespace and commas.

Classes/ICTokenField.html#/c:@M@ICInputA.name: icon
Classes/ICTokenField.html#/c:@M@ICInputA.abstract: The image on the left of text field.

Classes/ICTokenField.html#/s:16ICInputAc.name: textField
Classes/ICTokenField.html#/s:16ICInputAc.abstract: The text field that handles text inputs.

Classes/ICTokenField.html#/c:@M@ICInputA.name: placeholder
Classes/ICTokenField.html#/c:@M@ICInputA.abstract: The placeholder with the default color and font.

Classes/ICTokenField.html#/s:16ICInputAc.name: normalTokenAttributes
Classes/ICTokenField.html#/s:16ICInputAc.abstract: Customized attributes for tokens in the normal state, e.g. NSFontAttributeName and NSForegroundColorAttributeName.

Classes/ICTokenField.html#/s:16ICInputAc.name: highlightedTokenAttributes
Classes/ICTokenField.html#/s:16ICInputAc.abstract: Customized attributes for tokens in the highlighted state.

Classes/ICTokenField.html#/c:@M@ICInputA.name: tintColor
Classes/ICTokenField.html#/c:@M@ICInputA.abstract: The tint color of icon image and text field.

Classes/ICTokenField.html#/c:@M@ICInputA.name: init(frame:)
Classes/ICTokenField.html#/c:@M@ICInputA.abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated view object with the specified frame rectangle.

Classes/ICTokenField.html#/c:@M@ICInputA.name: init(coder:)
Classes/ICTokenField.html#/c:@M@ICInputA.abstract: Returns an object initialized from data in a given unarchiver.

Classes/ICTokenField.html#/s:16ICInputAc.name: completeCurrentInputText()
Classes/ICTokenField.html#/s:16ICInputAc.abstract: Creates a token with the current input text.

Classes/ICTokenField.html#/s:16ICInputAc.name: resetTokens()
Classes/ICTokenField.html#/s:16ICInputAc.abstract: Removes the input text and all displayed tokens.

Classes/ICKeyboardDismissTextField.html#.name: keyboardAccessoryView
Classes/ICKeyboardDismissTextField.html#.abstract: The custom input accessory view with a button to dismiss keyboard.

Classes/ICKeyboardDismissTextField.html#.name: init(frame:)
Classes/ICKeyboardDismissTextField.html#.abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated view object with the specified frame rectangle.

Classes/ICKeyboardDismissTextField.html#.name: init(coder:)
Classes/ICKeyboardDismissTextField.html#.abstract: Returns an object initialized from data in a given unarchiver.

Classes/ICKeyboardDismissAccessoryView.h.name: buttonColor
Classes/ICKeyboardDismissAccessoryView.h.abstract: The background color of the button to dismiss keyboard.

Classes/ICKeyboardDismissAccessoryView.h.name: init(frame:)
Classes/ICKeyboardDismissAccessoryView.h.abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated view object with the specified frame rectangle.

Classes/ICKeyboardDismissAccessoryView.h.name: init(coder:)
Classes/ICKeyboardDismissAccessoryView.h.abstract: Returns an object initialized from data in a given unarchiver.

Classes/ICKeyboardDismissAccessoryView.h.name: ICKeyboardDismissAccessoryView
Classes/ICKeyboardDismissAccessoryView.h.abstract: A customized keyboard accessory view with a dismiss button.

Classes/ICKeyboardDismissTextField.html.name: ICKeyboardDismissTextField
Classes/ICKeyboardDismissTextField.html.abstract: A text field that has a button to dismiss keyboard on the input accessory view.

Classes/ICTokenField.html.name: ICTokenField
Classes/ICTokenField.html.abstract: A text field that groups input texts with delimiters.
